item.title: Have to start somewhere
item.description: In August I left my role at Skyscanner to take a career break with an ambitious list of things I wanted to achieve before I started a new role. One of those items was to start a blog and get into a writing routine. There are so many topics, ideas and opinions battling in my head and I have wanted a space to get them down in writing. Tech leadership, individual contributor career information, continious improvement, all things data, distributed systems but to name just a few topics.
